name: Cute Cat
description: Cats are super duper cute.

name: Old Pueblo Traders Calcutta Cloth Separates Skirt
description: Refresh your weekend wardrobe with breezy, crinkled calcutta cloth. Pull-on style with an elastic waist. Slant pockets. Inseams M-29'', P-27'', W-29'',WP-27''. Cotton/polyester. Machine wash/dry. Imported.

name: PUMA Women's Tazon 6 FM Running Shoe in Medium and Wide
description: A sleek, streamlined silhouette sets the Puma Tazon 6 shoe apart from the rest. This stylish sneaker sports a synthetic upper with midfoot saddle for maximum fit and comfort while EVA in the heel absorbs impact.

name: Drapers & Damons Tied Sleeve Pucker Up Dress
description: Dress to refresh. Women's casual dress is designed in a textured pucker fabric that feels blissfully light and cool. Styled with short sleeves with ties and elastic banding at cuffs. Princess seams. Side pockets.

name: Free People Women's Breathe Easy Sport Bra
description: Women's regular sizes. Racerback. Polyester/cotton.

name: Sahalie Women's Cotton Dobby V-Neck Top
description: Easy for summer in an allover woven blue dobby design with raglan sleeves decorated with super cute tassel fringe. Your white jeans are waiting.- 25 Long- Misses S-XL- 100% Cotton- Machine wash cold- Imported- Fit: Relaxed

name: Michael Kors Junie Medium Backpack
description: Backpack with soft polished leather exterior. Lined interior. Approx. 12-1/2"W x 6"D x 11-3/4"H.

name: Luii Women's Long Ruffle-Front Boiled-Wool Jacket
description: Ruffled stand-up collar. Front button closure with ruffle trim. Approx. 35" center back length. 100% boiled wool

name: Journee Collection Women's Link Bootie
description: Synthetic suede-look upper. 3-1/4" Cuban heel. Zipper closure

name: Koret Gored Denim Skirt
description: Denim made better with shape-retaining stretch and a comfortable, all-around flat elastic waist. Flattering gored-panel drape, on-seam pockets and back zipper. Woven cotton/spandex. Machine washable. Imported. Lengths approx. M-34, P-31, W-34.

name: Signature by Levi Strauss & Co. Curvy-Fit Straight Jean - Awaken
description: Women's regular sizes. Cotton/polyester/spandex. Curvy fit. Straight leg. Mid-rise.

name: Sahalie Women's Wrap Skirted Pant
description: Hippie chic wide-leg pant and skirt in one with attached fabric belt. More stylish than sweats and just as relaxed. Misses S-XL.- 22" pant inseam; skirt length 18 1/2"- Space-dye polyester/rayon fabric- Washable- Imported- Fit: Relaxed

name: Grace in LA Women's Plus Embellished Skinny Roll-Up Capri Jean
description: Women's plus sizes. Cotton/polyester/rayon/spandex. Capri length; cuffed with embellished hems.

name: AVORA Sterling Silver Dangling Butterfly Oval Drop Earrings
description: Sterling silver. 1.96" hanging length

name: Fossil Women's Riley Stainless Steel Crystal Multifunction Watch
description: 3-hand quartz movement. Subdials for day, date and 24-hour time. Stainless steel case and caseback. Crystal bezel. Adjustable stainless steel bracelet with deployment clasp.

name: Ray-Ban Unisex Wayfarer Polarized Sunglasses - RB2132, Tortoise/Brown
description: Plastic frames. Polarized. 100% UV protection. Includes case and lens cleaning cloth.

name: SOREL OUT 'N ABOUT PLUS STRAP Women Sandals
description: This casual sandal has the versatility and comfort you’ve always wanted from an on-trend sandal. Featuring stretchy foot-hugging straps, nubuck-and-gore upper, and PU footbed for non-stop comfort—you’ll wear these sandals everywhere and anywhere.

name: Sorel Slimpack Lace II Boots
description: Traditional duck boot style crafted in rubber and waterproof leather. Seam sealed waterproof construction. Lace up front. Microfleece lining. Quilted wool collar. Herringbone pattern outsole for traction.- Waterproof leather & rubber- Whole & half sizes 6-10, 11- Medium width- Heel height 1.79", shaft height 6"- Imported

name: Sorel Out 'N About Bootie
description: Combination slipper and bootie in one. Water resistant suede upper with faux fur collar. Rubber outsole in a herringbone design provides traction. Faux shearling liner. Removable chenille footbed. Wear folded over or unfolded.- Suede/faux fur- Whole sizes

name: Civil Society Men's Connor Knit Blazer – Navy
description: Men's regular sizes. Cotton/polyester. Dry clean. Wrinkle-free knit fabric

name: Galaxy by Harvic Men's Slim-Fit Belted Dress Pant
description: Men's regular sizes. Polyester/rayon. Machine wash. Slim Fit.

name: Cole Haan Men's Grandpro Rally Laser-Cut Sneaker
description: Leather upper with laser-cut details. Leather lining. Rubber outsole. OrthoLite antimicrobial insole. GRANDFOAM cushioning

name: adidas Men's Team Issue Zippered Hoodie
description: Addidas. Sweatshirts & Hoodies. Collegiate Royal/White.

name: Jachs Men's Tropical-Print Poplin Short-Sleeved Shirt – Dark
description: Men's regular sizes. Peached poplin fabric. Front button closure

name: Dockers Men's Ultimate Short
description: Men's regular sizes. Supreme Flex. On-seam pockets

name: Ray-Ban Unisex RB3016 Clubmaster Sunglasses
description: Metal frames. UV protection. Includes case and cloth

name: PUMA Men's Ember TRL Trail Running Shoe
description: Mesh and synthetic upper. Synthetic lining. Rubber lug outsole for traction. Sculpted foam cushioned midsole

name: Timberland Men's Hooded Windbreaker Jacket
description: Wind and weather resistant. Ripstop fabric. Attached hood with drawcord adjustment. Elasticized cuffs

name: PUMA Men's Rebel Jogger Pant – Limestone
description: Cotton/polyester French terry. Machine wash. Regular fit. Elasticized waistband with internal drawcord

name: Carhartt Men's Rugged Flex Relaxed-Fit Straight Jean
description: Jeans made to work as hard as you do. With added stretch and strength to brush off the daily beating and get back to work good as new. Rugged Flex technology moves and stretches with you throughout the day so that whatever you're doing, it's easier to do.

name: Stacy Adams Men's Dunbar Wingtip Oxford
description: Leather upper. Leather lining. Medium width. Memory foam cushioned insole.

name: Dr. Scholl's Men's Sync Oxford - Dark Tan Smooth
description: Amp up your everyday look in a versatile oxford that looks as good as it feels. The BE FREE Energy Technology insole offers 3 zones for maximum comfort: extra support under the toe, high-recovery foam at the ball of the foot, and dense foam cradling the heel.

name: Casio Men's G-Shock X-Large Black and Goldtone Analog/Digital Watch
description: G-Shock adds high gloss finishes and goldtone dials to its X-Large case designs for a visually powerful look. Shock-resistant design. Auto LED light with afterglow.

name: Frye Oliver Messenger Bag
description: Messenger bag with dip-dyed leather exterior. Adjustable, removable strap with 21" drop.

name: Stacy Adams Men's Madison Leather Belt – Sizes 32-44
description: Leather. Perforated leather keeper. Brushed nickel finish buckle

name: Samsung 65" Curved UHD 4K HDR LED Smart TV - UN65RU7300F
description: All the game-changing clarity of 4K, with an elegant twist. The beautiful curved screen upscales all of your favorite content to superior 4K quality. The natural flow of the TV's curve and surprisingly slim bezel brings a new level of sophistication to TV design. Samsung UHD TV works with your smart home device so your life just got simpler. It's easy to connect your Alexa or Google enabled devices. With Samsung UHD TV's compatibility, have your smart device turn on your TV, change channels, control volume and more.

name: Samsung 35.7" 2.1-Channel Bluetooth Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer - Charcoal Black, HW-R450
description: The R450 soundbar is optimized to work seamlessly with Samsung TVs. Enjoy plug-and-play connectivity via wired or wireless connections, control both TV and soundbar with the Samsung OneRemote, and fine-tune your sound right from the TV menu. Go beyond what you see, and experience more powerful sound with clear tones and deep bass. Pairs seamlessly with your Samsung TV. Feel the subtle rumble of distant thunder and earth-shattering sounds as they pound the air around you with the powerful included wireless subwoofer.

name: Sony PS4 Pro 1TB Console
description: PS4 Pro gets you closer to your game,Explore vivid game worlds with rich visuals heightened by PS4 Pro

name: Nest x Yale Lock - Polished Brass, RB-YRD540-WV-605
description: This secure, tamper-proof, key-free deadbolt connects to the Nest app. You can lock and unlock your door from anywhere. Give pass codes to guests. Lock and check your door status with your voice using the Google Assistant. And get alerts whenever someone comes and goes.

name: Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation - White, T3017US
description: The Nest Learning Thermostat programs itself to help save energy. It learns what temperature you like and builds a schedule around yours. You can control it from anywhere with the Nest app.

name: Nest Cam IQ outdoor - White, NC4100US
description: The Nest Cam IQ outdoor security camera is a powerhouse of brains and brawn. Its weatherproof and tamper-resistant to help you know about a break-in before it happens.

name: JBL Bluetooth Around-Ear Headphones - Black, LIVE500BTBLKAM
description: In your world, superior sound is essential, so slip on a pair of JBL LIVE500BT wireless around-ear headphones. Equipped with massive 50mm drivers, JBL LIVE500BT headphones deliver JBL Signature Sound punctuated with enhanced bass so every track on every playlist pops. Easily access the Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa with a tap on the ear cup and play your favorite playlist, text your friend or check the weather and much more, without glancing at your phone.

name: AVGO 5-in-1 Sound System
description: Our exclusive AVGO™ line of easy-to-use electronics brings fun family entertainment and dependable office essentials into your home. With the same great features as top national brands, AVGO electronics also offer the reliability and value you're sure to appreciate. Play your whole music collection on this versatile 5-in‑1 sound system.

name: Apple AirPods Gen 2 Wireless Headphones with Wired Charging Case - White, MV7N2AM/A
description: AirPods deliver the wireless headphone experience, reimagined. Just pull them out of the charging case and they're ready to use with your iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, or Mac. After a simple one-tap setup, AirPods work like magic. They're automatically on and always connected. AirPods can even sense when they're in your ears and pause when you take them out.

name: GPX 19" 720p LED TV
description: This GPX 19" widescreen LED TV with HDMI input and USB port is perfect for any small room in your home. With its PC input, you can also use it as a monitor for your computer.

name: VIZIO SmartCast V-Series 40" UHD 4K HDR LED Smart TV - V405-G9
description: Value and quality come together in the VIZIO V-Series 40" Class 4K HDR Smart TV, offering state-of-the-art 4K resolution, high dynamic range support, smart TV apps, and voice control compatibilities with select devices. The V-Series TV offers Ultra HD (3840×2160) resolution, delivering 4x the detail of a Full HD TV. HD video is automatically upscaled for the best possible picture, and the V-Series TV is equipped to support high dynamic range for dazzling colors and contrast.

name: Samsung 32" 720p LED Smart TV - UN32M4500AF
description: This GPX 19" widescreen LED TV with HDMI input and USB port is perfect for any small room in your home. With its PC input, you can also use it as a monitor for your computer.

name: Samsung 55" Curved UHD 4K HDR LED Smart TV - UN55RU7300F
description: All the game-changing clarity of 4K, with an elegant twist. The beautiful curved screen upscales all of your favorite content to superior 4K quality. The natural flow of the TV's curve and surprisingly slim bezel brings a new level of sophistication to TV design. Samsung UHD TV works with your smart home device so your life just got simpler. It's easy to connect your Alexa or Google enabled devices. With Samsung UHD TV's compatibility, have your smart device turn on your TV, change channels, control volume and more.

name: Amcrest HD 1080p-Lite 4-Channel Video Security System with 4 1MP Bullet Cameras - AMDVTENL4-4B-B
description: Includes 1080p-Lite 4-channel DVR (AMDVTENL4-H5), four 1MP 720p (1280TVL) heavy-duty metal IP67 bullet cameras (AMC721BC36-B), four 60' BNC coaxial cables, 4-channel DC12V power supply, DVR DC12V power supply, user manual and quick start guide

name: Ring Video Doorbell 2
description: Next-level security and convenience that works on any home and includes a rechargeable battery pack. Watch over your home in crystal-clear Full HD (1080p) video and see, hear and speak to visitors from anywhere. With instant mobile alerts and 2-way talk, you can answer the door from your smartphone, tablet and PC. Ring lets you adjust your motion sensors so you can find the ideal setting for your home. You'll get instant alerts when motion is detected, allowing you to protect your property from the comfort of your smartphone. Video Doorbell 2 works on any home and includes a quick-release rechargeable battery, so you can charge your doorbell without removing the device.

name: Amazon Echo Alexa-Enabled Speaker (2nd Generation) - Charcoal Fabric
description: Amazon Echo is a hands-free speaker you control with your voice. Echo connects to the Alexa Voice Service to play music, ask questions, make calls, send and receive messages, provide information, news, sports scores, weather and more – instantly. Just ask for a song, artist or genre from Amazon Music, Spotify, Pandora and more. With multi-room music, you can play music on compatible Echo devices in different rooms. Echo can also play Audible audiobooks, radio stations, news briefs and more. Call or message almost anyone hands-free with your Echo device. Also, instantly connect to other Echo devices in your home using just your voice.

name: Shark ION Robot Vacuum Cleaning System with Wi-Fi - RV851WV
description: Shark has combined 2 cleaning innovations into one cleaning system: a high-performance robot vacuum paired with a built-in, ultra-powerful handheld vacuum for versatile cleaning from floor to ceiling. The robot gives you powerful suction, an XL dust bin, and a self-cleaning brush roll, perfect for tackling pet hair, dust and dander. The hand vacuum provides incredible cleaning performance in a compact size, perfect for spot cleaning and tidying up messes.

name: JBL Flip 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker - Black, FLIP5
description: Take your tunes on the go with the powerful JBL Flip 5. This lightweight Bluetooth speaker goes anywhere. Bad weather? Not to worry. With its waterproof design, you can rock out to JBL signature sound – rain or shine. Pair two JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers together for stereo sound or link multiple JBL PartyBoost compatible speakers to create a bigger party. Enjoy more than 12 hours of play time for your favorite music. Stand it vertical or horizontal.

name: GuruGear Active Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - White/Silver
description: Maximize the performance of your electronics at home and on the go with our select GuruGear™ line. From cutting-edge gadgets to everyday basics, GuruGear electronics provide you with the easy solutions and money-saving value you want to enhance your tech-savvy life.

name: Apple iPod touch 32GB 7th Generation with 4" Retina Touch Screen - Pink, MVHR2LL/A
description: Love music? You can keep more songs than ever on iPod touch. Get an Apple Music subscription to stream 50 million songs and download your favorites. Or load iPod touch with songs you love from the iTunes Store. 4" diagonal Retina widescreen display with multi-touch IPS technology. 32GB internal memory.

name: Apple MacBook Air 13.3" HD 128GB Laptop Computer - MQD32LL/A
description: 13.3" diagonal widescreen LED backlit display with HD (720p) resolution. Apple MacOS operating system. 1.6GHz Intel Core i5 dual-core processor with 3MB cache. 128GB flash storage.

name: AVGO 10.1" HD Intel Cherry Trail 4GB Memory 32GB Flash Storage Windows 10 2-in-1 Laptop/Tablet Computer with Detachable Keyboard - Black
description: Our exclusive AVGO™ line of easy-to-use electronics brings fun family entertainment and dependable office essentials into your home. With the same great features as top national brands, AVGO electronics also offer the reliability and value you’re sure to appreciate. This go-everywhere laptop/tablet is the perfect size for your busy lifestyle. Its detachable keyboard gives you the best of both worlds.

name: CyberPowerPC Gamer Master AMD Ryzen 3 8GB Memory GeForce GT 1030 2GB Graphics Card 1TB Hard Drive 120GB SSD Windows 10 Gaming Desktop Computer - GMA600
description: 3.5GHz AMD Ryzen 3-2300X quad-core processor with 8MB L3 cache. Custom RGB case lighting. Windows 10 Home operating system. 120GB solid state drive.

name: Brother Work Smart Wireless Multifunction Inkjet Printer - MFCJ497DW
description: The Brother Work Smart Series MFC-J497DW is easy to connect, compact, affordable and loaded with features and functionality to help boost productivity in your home, home office, dorm room or small office. This wireless color inkjet all-in-one delivers high-quality output, lets you reliably print, copy, scan and fax and enables wireless mobile device printing from your desktop, laptop, smartphone or tablet (requires connection to a wireless network). Use the automatic document feeder and 100-sheet capacity paper tray for generous output without constant monitoring and help save paper with automatic duplex (2-sided) printing. Cloud connectivity lets you scan-to popular Cloud services directly from the printer (requires an internet connection and an account with desired service).

name: GuruGear Multisport GPS Smartwatch Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate
description: Maximize the performance of your electronics at home and on the go with our select GuruGear™ line. From cutting-edge gadgets to everyday basics, GuruGear electronics provide you with the easy solutions and money-saving value you want to enhance your tech-savvy life. This GuruGear Multisport GPS Smartwatch tracks your activity, monitors heart rate, lets you make and receive phone calls, receive notifications, play music and more!

name: Apple Watch Series 5 (GPS) with 44mm Gold Aluminum Case and Pink Sand Sport Band - MWVE2LL/A
description: You no longer need to raise your wrist or touch the screen to see the time or other information on your watch face, because the display never sleeps. All you need to do is glance to find the time or your workout metrics right there where you want them. With the ECG app, Apple Watch Series 5 is capable of generating an ECG similar to a single-lead electrocardiogram. It's a momentous achievement for a wearable device that can provide data for doctors and peace of mind for you. All around, Apple Watch inspires a healthier life.

name: alcove Madison Platform Bed - King, Walnut
description: Our exclusive alcove™ line delivers outstanding value with products that bring comfort and warmth to your home. Update your bedroom with this stylish alcove® platform bed that supports your mattress with no box spring needed!

name: South Shore Valet 2-Drawer Nightstand
description: Modern farmhouse style. Designed with an industrial appearance and aged-looking finish. Engineered wood

name: Leather Office Guest Chair / Reception Chair
description: Approx. 25W x 30D x 30H. Bonded leather seat; 250-lb. weight capacit. Real Wood Body

name: CorLiving California 24-Panel Bench in Leatherette
description: Featuring a foam padded surface finished with top stitching and stylish tufting. The rich leatherette is complemented by dark espresso-stained, parson-styled leg. Pine and leatherette material

name: Safavieh Medford Table Lamp
description: Iron. Approx. 10 inches-diameter tapered white cotton shade

name: Convenience Concepts Soho Coffee Table
description: Features a gray top surface. Tempered glass sides. Bottom shelf for display and storage. Engineered wood

name: Venetian Worldwide Rhian Reversible Modular Sectional Sofa
description: Movable armless chair allows sectional to be reversible and modular with locking brackets. Polyester linen-like fabric upholstery. Overstuffed cushions. Includes 3 accent pillows

name: Convenience Concepts 2-Tier Round End Table
description: Open modern design. 2 shelves. Glass

name: Alcove Amherst 16 inch Square Pillow
description: 16 inch square. Polyester; polyester fill. Spot clean. Imported

name: Lumisource Campania Mid Century Dining Chair
description: Woven fabric upholstery and bent wood legs. Made from fabric and wood. Approx. 21 inches W x 21-1/4 inches D x 28-3/4 inches H.

name: Lumisource Verdana Mid Century Modern Dining Chair
description: Head of table arm chair. Woven fabric upholstery and bent wood legs. Made from fabric and wood. Approx. 21 inches W x 21-1/4 inches D x 28-3/4 inches H.

name: McLeland Design Holderby Farmhouse Table
description: Washed finish. Engineered wood with veneer, rubber wood legs. Approx. 66 inches L x 39 inches W x 30-1/2 inches H

name: Powdercoat Rectangular Metal Indoor-Outdoor Table
description: Metal indoor outdoor table with a beeautiful pastel powdercoat finish.

name: LifeMax Electric 6' Air Hockey Table
description: Family fun starts with LifeMax™ indoor games! The action never stops with our electric air hockey table! A powerful blower motor and high-gloss playing surface provide smooth airflow and lightning-fast gameplay. Includes 2 pushers and 2 pucks. 72"L x 36"W x 31-1/2"H

name: alcove Misha 30-Pc. Bedroom Super Set - Cal. King
description: Our alcove™ line of products delivers outstanding value as you set up your home. This 30-pc. super set has everything you need to redecorate your bedroom at an affordable price. 30-pc. set includes comforter, dust ruffle, 2 shams, 2 Euro shams, 4 accent pillows, 2 flat sheets, 2 fitted sheets, 6 pillowcases, 4 drapery panels, 4 tiebacks and 2 valances. Fitted sheet fits mattresses up to 13"H

name: McLeland Design 3-Shelf Floor Lamp - Cherry
description: Designed just for you, our signature McLeland Design™ collection brings lasting style and quality to your home. Contemporary 3-shelf floor lamp provides a warm glow and plenty of room for decorative accessories. Features 3 display shelves. Wood with cherry-colored finish. White fabric shade. Bulb included.

name: Trademark Fine Art Wall Art
description: Contemporary. 3 piece set. 30" x 41'

name: KitchenAid Custom Metallic 5-qt. 325-Watt Tilt-Back Head Stand Mixer
description: 10-speed stand mixer. 5-qt. capacity bowl. Includes mixer, 5-qt. stainless steel bowl, flat beater, dough hook, wire whip, pouring shield, manual and recipe book.

name: KitchenAid 7-Speed Digital Hand Mixer
description: 7-speed digital hand mixer puts power and precision right at your fingertips. Turbo II stainless steel beaters have no center posts so ingredients won’t get stuck. Stainless steel Pro Whisk provides fast whipping of egg whites and more.

name: KitchenAid 10-Pc. Non-Stick Cookware Set
description: Experience the practicality and style that only nonstick aluminum cookware delivers with this KitchenAid 10-piece set. Heavy-gauge 4.0 mm aluminum ensures increased durability and even heating while an induction-capable stay-flat base resists warping. TeflonTM Xtra three-layer nonstick coating completes the impressive features for an easy, worry-free clean up. Set includes 8" skillet, 10" skillet, 1.5-quart saucepan with lid, 2.5-quart saucepan with lid, 3-quart saute pan with lid, and 6-quart low casserole with lid.
